title: Gmail’s ‘new integrated view’ web redesign starts rolling out next week
content:
After teasing last year, Google today finally detailed how the “new Gmail view” redesign is rolling out on the web over the coming weeks and months. 

more…

description: After teasing last year, Google today finally detailed how the "new Gmail view" redesign is rolling out on the web over the coming weeks...
